title: RECONNECT PROBLEMS!
body:
Already lost 5 games because i can't get in game.

Unable to connect to the server. Please check your network connection and attempt to reconnect to your game.

my internet is fine and i can get into champion select, but when the game is gonna start it kick me out.

All my games where on ranked and got a time out now for every game ( 5 min )

FIX THIS!

replies.body: Damn, it sucks to hear you're losing all of these games.  It may be a good idea to hold back for now and test things out in custom games until you're sure things are going to be okay.  Your specific issue sounds like a connection problem with your network failing to reach the game server.  Getting the HRT was a good step, but I suggest going through every step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide too.  The steps there should help fix this up!
Already used the hextech repair tool, nothing seems to work!
